name: SSF: Time Runner
description:
SSF: Time Runner is a fanmade visual novel based on Super Science Friends - a famous animated series from YouTube. Join marvellous misadventures of a teenage clone of Albert Einstein and help him to fix all the terrible mistakes he made during the series.

Plot summary (no spoilers!)

The main goal of Einstein is rescuing a love of his life - his adorable princess Peach aka ingenious Isaac Newton. It won't be easy  and Einstein will have to face many difficulties and make many choices - but the true love conquers it all! 

This game is interactive and contains elements of dating sim. EVERY choice you made in the game matters, so be careful and don't forget to save your progress!

ATTENTION!  If the game starts in Russian, just click A LAMP and choose English! System Requirements

Platform: 

PC (Windows, macOS), Android

Weight: 

180 MB (Windows) / 162 MB (macOS) / 183 MB (Android) 

Language:

English / Russian

Recommended to play with the sound turned on.

Please, let us know if you find any bugs or mistakes! Feel free to ask us questions in the comments bellow (or mail us: ssftimerunner@gmail.com).  Also, we will be happy to read any reviews and comments about our game, so welcome to our comment section!
